entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
